content: EVA #3 is in the bag! A huge accomplishment today by John Grunsfeld and the rest of the crew of Atlantis: ***http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/30779021/*** COS passed its aliveness and functional tests. The repaired ACS instrument passed all of its tests on one channel. The other channel's status is TBD.
reply: EVA #3 is in the bag! A huge accomplishment today by John Grunsfeld and the rest of the crew of Atlantis: ***http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/30779021/*** COS passed its aliveness and functional tests. The repaired ACS instrument passed all of its tests on one channel. The other channel's status is TBD.
title: Astronaut John Grunsfeld Makes It Look Easy

content: We really have to get an American on the moon again, and eventually to Mars....We're the best
reply: We really have to get an American on the moon again, and eventually to Mars....We're the best
title: Astronaut John Grunsfeld Makes It Look Easy

content: I can't imajine trying to do that stuff with those glove and suit on. Good job to the pros. You know, one day those types of jobs will be "blue collar" space mechanics doing them. If it was not for the astronauts paving the way, it would never have been possible.
